Title: Across the Universe
Genre: Drama, Fantasy, History, Music, Musical, Romance
Writer: Dick Clement (screenplay), Ian La Frenais (screenplay), Julie Taymor (story), Dick Clement (story), Ian La Frenais (story)
Actors: Evan Rachel Wood, Jim Sturgess, Joe Anderson, Dana Fuchs
Plot: The music of The Beatles and the Vietnam War form the backdrop for the romance between an upper-class American girl and a poor Liverpudlian artist.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 16 nominations.
